data.eml:eml: Revision of the Afrotropical species of Dohrniphora DAHL (Diptera: Phoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Disney, R. Henry L. (2003): Revision of the Afrotropical species of Dohrniphora DAHL (Diptera: Phoridae). Zootaxa 196: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156866
